innhold.avsnitt: You can combine parental benefit with work. You can choose between

liste.punkt: working full-time and postponing your entire parental benefit period
working part-time and extending your parental benefit period

innhold.avsnitt: If you work part-time, your parental benefit will be reduced according to how much you work. At the same time, your period of leave will be extended according to how much you work.
If you and your partner wish to spend your parental benefit periods at the same time, the coverage cannot exceed more than 100 per cent in total. Note that both parents must apply.
Use the parental leave plannerto determine how you can work part-time and extending your parental benefit period or postpone the parental benefit period when you are working full-time.
